title: Jewel of Light
summaries: The Jewel of Light is a Master Mode-exclusive light pet-summoning item that has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance to be dropped by the Empress of Light. When used, it will summon a pet Fairy Princess that provides pink-colored light. It is fast and will always position itself slightly elevated behind the player.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a fairy princess to provide light
'A glowing gemstone that houses a powerful fairy.'
statistics.Sell: 5
